line.comment: * 1. Delete it if the station was destroyed or changed ownership.
* 2. Check the goals and complete it if met.
* 3. Update Mission entries as it progresses.
* 4. Fail it if you can no longer complete it.
* Add-Ons 1.4.25: Fix null error. If a suspect (not the stolen ship) no longer exists, then it needs to be removed from the list by forcing a mission update.
* Just a suspect is dead. Note: don't update PER dead ship all at once; update if a ship in the current array is dead. This will update again if more ships are dead.

line.text: 'Сканер готов; для продолжения, остановите свой корабль...'

line.comment: * Called every 20 seconds, this is used to create up to 2 random missions at a sector that is within a 12 jump radius of the player.
* Prior to this, missions would ONLY be created as a player entered a sector.
* Find an available random sector close to the player.
* If a sector was found, generate missions there.
* Generates up to 2 missions in this sector.
* Find a random player-visible sector within x jumps of the player.
* Ignore player sectors, sectors with no owner. (Add-Ons 1.4.3a: Skip sectors whose owner is in permanent war with the player.)

sval.val: Сканер готов; для продолжения, остановите свой корабль...
1. Delete it if the station was destroyed or changed ownership.
2. Check the goals and complete it if met.
3. Update Mission entries as it progresses.
4. Fail it if you can no longer complete it.
Add-Ons 1.4.25: Fix null error. If a suspect (not the stolen ship) no longer exists, then it needs to be removed from the list by forcing a mission update.
Just a suspect is dead. Note: don't update PER dead ship all at once; update if a ship in the current array is dead. This will update again if more ships are dead.
Called every 20 seconds, this is used to create up to 2 random missions at a sector that is within a 12 jump radius of the player.
Prior to this, missions would ONLY be created as a player entered a sector.
Find an available random sector close to the player.
If a sector was found, generate missions there.
Generates up to 2 missions in this sector.
Find a random player-visible sector within x jumps of the player.
Ignore player sectors, sectors with no owner. (Add-Ons 1.4.3a: Skip sectors whose owner is in permanent war with the player.)
